name: The Blue Marlin
overview: Catch this! Your chance to reel in the action! HOT-B presents the exhilarating and backbreaking challenge of saltwater fishing for your NES. Below the warm blue waters, off the world's most famous deep sea fishing destinations, awaits the ultimate fishing trophy - THE BLUE MARLIN. Match your strength against the writhing frenzy of the powerful Blue Marlin. THE BLUE MARLIN is not another fish story, it's a realistic fishing simulation guaranteed to get you hooked!
